channel.title: Gfx facing someone?
channel.description: Hi, I'm trying to make my full range, and i have everything, but it doesn't pull the arrow back, and I tried making it work, but when i do, it just does it facing south, and not the NPC, which just looks rubbish, anyone know how to make it face the same way my projectile is going?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 03:21:53 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 05:06:31 AM[/size][hr]Does anybody know how?

item.title: Gfx facing someone?
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Hi, I’m trying to make my full range, and i have everything, but it doesn’t pull the arrow back, and I tried making it work, but when i do, it just does it facing south, and not the NPC, which just looks rubbish, anyone know how to make it face the same way my projectile is going?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 03:21:53 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 05:06:31 AM[/size][hr]Does anybody know how?
